title: So many bots in OCE
body:
In the few days I am seeing so many bots
Surprised there are not more posts or are people just "used" to them now?
Obvious signs, slow to move at start, run straight up mid and feed, name looks normal apart from some random characters at the start or finish

Whats the right way to report?  Cheating? or AFK or something else

replies.body:
Bots are banned in waves to obfuscate detection methods, so there will be periods where they are somewhat more prevalent. Many schools have also just gone back which means a drop in player numbers overall, particularly during the day. Low level ARAMs and co-op vs AI are also where the bots tend to congregate, so you're sort of in the hot spot all round. 

The best thing you can do is report them for cheating, and they'll get picked up in the next wave.
